from inspect_viz import Data
from inspect_viz.plot import plot, legend
from inspect_viz.mark import Mark, bar_x, rule_y, frame
from inspect_viz.transform import sql

evals = Data.from_file("evals.csv")

def score_rule(hint: str, offset: int) -> Mark:
    return rule_y(
        evals,
        x1=0,
        x2="score_overall_value",
        y="model",
        filter=sql(f"task_arg_hint = {hint}"),
        dy=offset,
        sort= { "y": "-x" },
        stroke=sql("IF(NOT task_arg_hint, 'No hint', 'Hint')"),
        stroke_width=3,
        stroke_linecap="round",
        marker_end="circle"
    )

plot(
    frame("left", inset_top=15, inset_bottom=15),
    score_rule("false", -10),
    score_rule("true", 10),
    legend="color",
    margin_left=100,
    y_label=None,
    x_label="score",
    x_domain=[0,0.30],
    color_domain=["No hint", "Hint"],
    color_range=["#a73d39", "#a73d3988"],
    y_tick_size=0,
    
)
